document.full_text: hsbc  said it agreed to pay $62.5 million to settle a class action brought against it in the united states over its role in providing administrative services to a fund which placed cash with wall street swindler bernard madoff.
document.title: hsbc agrees $62.5 million madoff lawsuit settlement
